name: UNGA BUNGA (Kenyy)
description:
UNGA BUNGA is a game about survival and resource collecting.
As your tribe has finally run out of food and resources, you were chosen to embark on an expedition pass the cave to find paradise. To do so, you must survive for 3 days in the cave, collecting food as well as avoiding dangerous cave animals.

UNGA BUNGA was developed by NoLife-1, a group of passionate student developers from UOWMKDU. The team consists of:

  • Sam Lee Chong Wei
    • Lead Programmer
  • Kenny Yeow Kai Jie
    • Lead Designer
  • Chuan Wei Yin
    • Lead Artist
  • Poon Hui Hua
    • Artist
  • Khairil Azmyr Bin Azizan
    • Programmer

BGM Credits: 
Joel Corelitz: Ni Hao, Hurry Up, Eastward, Cranky Engine
Animal Crossing: New Leaf soundtrack - Tortimer Island (Lobby)

UNGA BUNGA is the first Unity game made by the group.
Made within 48 hours for UOWMKDU SCCM Sem Jam - September 2022.
